title: What Makes Motorsport Interesting To You? - /SHAKEDOWN
description:
Leo Parente asks Mike Spinelli, Ian Whelan, and YOU 3 simple questions about why you like motorsport and what would make you like it more.  But, like every /DRIVE discussion, the talk covers so much more - Leo challenges the 'Fans booing Vettel', Ian wishes for 'Technical Diversity', Spinelli thinks 'Figure 8 Racing' is the answer [OMG].
 
And yes, we ARE deferring a TUDOR United SportsCar Pre-season Debrief on THIS /ShakeDown - Waiting on a few more facts, giving the Series time to sort itself out further, and THEN [before the January 24-25 Rolex Daytona 24] we WILL share a complete and unfiltered point of view.
 
But for today, it's the 'Big Picture' of racing.
